replies.body:
You're acting like it ever existed in the first place.

This is OCE, buddy. There IS no talent.

Shern is one of the best players in soloq history. All his accounts are diamond + and his reached 2 different accounts too rank #1 in OCE. In 2 weeks he got from diamond to rank 4 in NA. He has 2 accounts in challenger sanspareil and sansparell. So OCE does have talent.

_"Why did Paws only get suspended from OPL and Shernfire is ineligible for all competitive play?"_
He's was banned completely wasn't he? At least a few of his accounts were anyway, from what I've heard.

Edit: Hi CptStupendous o.o
I've read a lot of these OPL news posts and never noticed your name before.. Looked back at a few and seen you actually do most of them..? Not sure how I missed that. xD

why u hev to be med roit he is a plebian he just wents to hev fun
he a gud guy cman
